mapper.select: SELECT VP.VARIACION_MEDIA_RELATIVA AS VARIACION_MEDIA_RELATIVA, VP.VARIACION_MAX_RELATIVA AS VARIACION_MAX_RELATIVA, VP.INDICADOR_ID AS INDICADOR_ID, VP.VARIABLE_ID_1 AS VARIABLE_ID_1, VP.VARIABLE_ID_2 AS VARIABLE_ID_2, 'variable'||VI1.VARIABLE_INFLUENCIA_ID AS VARIABLE_1_DESC, 'variable'||VI2.VARIABLE_INFLUENCIA_ID AS VARIABLE_2_DESC FROM MD_RELEVANCIA_VARIABLES_PARES VP INNER JOIN MD_VARS_INF VI1 ON VI1.VARIABLE_INFLUENCIA_ID = VP.VARIABLE_ID_1 INNER JOIN MD_VARS_INF VI2 ON VI2.VARIABLE_INFLUENCIA_ID = VP.VARIABLE_ID_2 AND VP.INDICADOR_ID = #{indicadorId}
SELECT VARIACION_MEDIA_RELATIVA, VARIACION_MAX_RELATIVA, INDICADOR_ID, VARIABLE_ID_1, VARIABLE_ID_2 FROM MD_RELEVANCIA_VARIABLES_PARES
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM MD_RELEVANCIA_VARIABLES_PARES

SELECT VARIACION_MEDIA_RELATIVA, VARIACION_MAX_RELATIVA, INDICADOR_ID, VARIABLE_ID_1, VARIABLE_ID_2 FROM MD_RELEVANCIA_VARIABLES_PARES WHERE INDICADOR_ID = #{indicadorId} AND VARIABLE_ID_1 = #{variableId1} AND VARIABLE_ID_2 = #{variableId2}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MD_RELEVANCIA_VARIABLES_PARES ( VARIACION_MEDIA_RELATIVA, VARIACION_MAX_RELATIVA, INDICADOR_ID, VARIABLE_ID_1, VARIABLE_ID_2 ) VALUES ( #{variacionMediaRelativa}, #{variacionMaxRelativa}, #{indicadorId}, #{variableId1}, #{variableId2} )
